install.name: Content - AddThis
install.author: AddThis, LLC
install.description: Help your visitors promote your site! The AddThis Joomla Plugin allows any visitor to bookmark your pages easily with many popular services. Sign up for an AddThis.com account to see how your visitors are sharing your content--which services they're using for sharing, which content is shared the most, and more. It's all free--even the pretty charts and graphs. This module only works with Joomla 1.5.x. To remove the button from an article, add a the custom tag {addthis off} in the article content.

param.name: pub_id
param.label: AddThis Username
param.description: Publisher ID for your AddThis account

param.name: custom_url
param.label: Custom Button URL
param.description: URL for your button If you selected ''Custom Button'' above

param.name: addthis_brand
param.label: Brand
param.description: Text label that shows on the top right of the menu

param.name: addthis_header_color
param.label: Header Color
param.description: Custom color to use for the text foreground in the header of the menu, in hex. (ex: ''#ff0000''). Leave blank for default.

param.name: addthis_header_background
param.label: Header Background
param.description: Custom color to use as a background in the header of the menu, in hex. (ex: ''#0000ff''). Leave blank for default.

param.name: addthis_options
param.label: Custom Service List
param.description: Comma-separated list of services to show in the compact menu. Leave blank for default.

param.name: addthis_offset_top
param.label: Menu Top Offset
param.description: Vertical offset for the drop-down window (in pixels). Leave blank for default.

param.name: addthis_offset_left
param.label: Menu Left Offset
param.description: Horizontal offset for the drop-down window (in pixels). Leave blank for default.

param.name: addthis_hover_delay
param.label: Hover Delay
param.description: Delay in opening of the compact menu in milliseconds (minimum 50, maximum 500). Leave blank for default.

param.name: addthis_hide_embed
param.label: Hide Flash Content
param.description: Temporarily hide flash objects that intersect the menu. Default is true.
